name: acp3/module-articles
description: Provides the articles module for the ACP3 CMS.

suggest.acp3/setup: Allows you to comfortably install and update the ACP3 components via an UI.
suggest.acp3/module-articles-search: Allows you to integrate the articles module into the search module.
suggest.acp3/module-articles-seo: Allows you to integrate the articles module into the SEO module.
suggest.acp3/module-articles-share: Allows you to integrate the articles module into the social sharing module.
